summary: 该插件用于检测Apache SkyWalking graphql接口是否存在CVE-2020-9483 SQL注入漏洞，通过发送特定构造的请求并分析响应结果来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Apache SkyWalking graphql interface has the CVE-2020-9483 SQL injection vulnerability. It confirms the existence of the vulnerability by sending specially crafted requests and analyzing the response results.
